name: dropdown.dot.js
body: # dropdown.dot.js A super-flexible and clean JQuery Dropdown Plugin based on [dot.js](https://github.com/olado/doT) Templates. ## Markup ## dot.js Templates ## Basic Usage $('select').dropdown(); ## Add additional data to your markup # For example you want to add a ```count``` for every item to show in the select menu next to the label. ## ... and use it in your template with {{=item.count}} ## Credits Coded by Roger Dudler http://twitter.com/rogerdudler
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A JQuery Plugin for super-flexible Dropdowns based on dot.js Templates
